The first live episode 👀

Jan 21, 2020

  • civictech
  • episode
  • digital service
  • live
  • stream

Join Leah Bannon, Mohith Rao, and Ryan Koch as they record a live episode streamed on the Twitch platform. They’ll discuss a number of topics including the responsibility tech companies have over their platforms, how regulations and agencies interact with large corporations, the inner workings of Code for America Brigade management, and even some sci-fi-esque public policy.
